amendment.description: An amendment to increase funding for Corps of Engineers Construction by $15 million and to reduce funding for Corps of Engineers Expenses by a similar amount.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Lujan, Ben Ray (NM) amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Lujan, Ben Ray (NM).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Lujan, Ben Ray (NM).
